name: circlesquaretriangle
description:
Binary choices are sometimes harder than they look.

Remember the sequence and match the shape on screen, that is all.

Made for SimpleJam and inspired by the OnePlus 2's boot screen animation, may it rest in peace.

[TUTORIAL]

I had a limited tutorial but it really wasn't working out, so till I've made something a bit more functional:

There are three shapes, move through the sequence of shapes by tapping left on the left or right side of the screen. You control the inner shape, match it to the outer shape.

==================

If you have any comments about the game I'd love to hear them in either the comments or a tweet. I plan on balancing and adding a couple features/polish before relealsing on Play Store so any feedback would help.

Have fun :)
